Summary: 5-6 star like lights in a line abrest formation traveling from north to south
divs: Sighting Details5-6 starlike lights in a line abrest formation flying from north to south at high speed no sound and seemed to be in the atmosphere, the 5th light fell back a bit then caught up,when the end lights pulled forward. they all seemed very fluid while changing positions. as they flew out of site in the southern sky. at 10:55 3 of the same formation of lights flew back from the south heading north with the lights changing positions in the same fluid manner once again no sound and appeared to be in the atmosphere.
